text: Golpe has multiple meanings, as described below: * In music, golpe can mean **golpe (guitar technique) is a Flamenco guitar technique where one uses the fingers to tap on the soundboard of the guitar, from the Spanish golpe, meaning to strike; **golpe (cuatro pattern), the percussive strummed patterns of the cuatro. * In politics, golpe can mean a coup d'Ã©tat, from the Spanish term golpe de estado. * In heraldry, golpe is a purple (purpure) roundel.
title: Golpe
